Calendar

There are 12 synodic months in a year (12 cycles of lunar phases) 360 days in a year (a close approximation of earth, but not exactly for sake of easy to calculate and no leap days months etc)

There are 4 seasons with 3 months each. Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter

The first of the month starts the day after the new moon.

Months

Number Month Season
1 Elderbloom Spring
2 Verdantwisp Spring
3 Blossomshroud Spring
4 Sunfire Summer
5 Hearthglow Summer
6 Goldenveil Summer
7 Emberfall Fall

Holidays

  • Bloomstide: 1.15
  • Sunfire Revelry: 4.15
  • King's day: 5.18
  • Harvest Bounty Celebration: 7.15
  • Harvest Festival: 8.15
  • The Day of the Dead: 9.30
  • Frostfall Gala: 10.15
  • Remembrance Day: 12.30

Eras

Each era is established by the naming of a new Ruler of xayd on King's Day. The year the new Ruler is named is the last year of the prior era and the new Ruler begins his official reign in a newly named era of their choosing until the next Ruler is appointed either upon their death, or other reasons for which the rules has been usurped or replaced.

There have been 13 eras to date in the Royal Records covering 1556 years (and counting)

Number Ruler's Name Era Name Era Abbr. Years in Era
1 Era of Radiant Glory ERG 75
2 Gold Age Era GAE 200
3 Crimson Dominion Era CDE 100
4 Eternal Prosperity Era EPE 150
5 Celestial Ascendancy Era CAE 300
6 Enigma Veil Era EVE 60
7 Shadowbane Era SBE 80
8 Harmonic Unity Era HUE 90
9 Luminous Sovereignty Era LSE 110
10 Verdant Blossom Era VBE 40
11 Ethereal Dominion Era EDE 250
12 Ironclad Dominion Era IDE 130
13 Tomah Hyrcanus Arcane Enlightenment Era AEE 70+

Current Year 70 AEE

Individual Important Days

Most people with in the realm have 2 important days sometimes there is three. The individual's birthday is important and usually coincides with their naming day, however that is not always the case.

But the day in which a person becomes an adult is their most important and the most celebrated day in their lives. It is called their Luminara.

On their Luminara an individual is free to choose their own name.

Important Planar Dates

  • 30th of the 1st month (wyld closest)
  • 8th of the 2nd month (divine closest)
  • 22nd of the 2nd month (divine closest)
  • 15th of the 3rd month (lunar closest)
  • 1st of the 4th month (solstice)
  • 22nd of the 5th month (Phoenix Day) (fire closest)
  • 8th of the 6th month (umbra furthest)
  • 15th of the 7th month (wyld furthest)
  • 15th of the 8th month (divine furthest)
  • 30th of the 8th month (divine furthest)
  • 30th of the 9th month (lunar furthest)
  • 1st of the 10th month (solstice)
  • 8th day of the 11th Month (fire furthest)
  • 22nd of the 12th month (umbra closest)

The Church of the Phoenix celebrates the Phoenix on the 22nd day of the 5th month.
